p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

p_102: AIRP course with stipend. Annual $1500 education fund. Digital library. RadPrimer, STATDx, eAnatomy and Titan Radiology subscription. Paid informatics course. Paid parking. iPad. Personal dictation mic. Memberships to Ohio State Medical Association, Columbus Medical Association, and American Medical Association. Monthly meal stipend. ESIR residents receive fitted lead and a subscription to Radiology Essentials. Additional travel stipend for first author presentations at a national conference
